text: @realDonaldTrump @JHoganGidley You say you hire the best people yet, you always end up firing all of your best people. You held a coronavirus task force, yet, you're holding rallies and you're not even asking your folks to wear masks, social distancing. To say that you're Mr paradox would be an understatement. https://t.co/UsFufyB3Wk
